Texts.Chs: 看起来通向某个地方。我能听到从远处传来的吼叫声。
Texts.Eng: Seems to lead somewhere. I can hear roars in the distance.

Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;三度仪^reset;，你就不能精确地定位远古控制台并激活它。请通过完成FU入门任务来获取一个三度仪。
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; you cannot properly locate the ancient console to activate it. Please complete the FU intro mission to obtain one.
